meanings.definition: Situated across the sea from the point of reference.
meanings.sent1: The oversea island was visible from the shore.
meanings.sent2: The ship sailed to the oversea destination.
meanings.sent3: The oversea view was so beautiful, it felt like a dream.
meanings.sent4: The oversea horizon seemed to call out to the adventurous souls.
meanings.sent5: The oversea landscape painted a picture of tranquility in my mind.

meanings.definition: In, to, or from a foreign country or countries across the sea.
meanings.sent1: She traveled oversea to explore new cultures.
meanings.sent2: The goods were shipped oversea for international trade.
meanings.sent3: He sent a message oversea to his pen pal.
meanings.sent4: Their love crossed oversea, defying all distances.
meanings.sent5: The music from oversea filled the room with exotic melodies.
